agent.name: Warden Travel Research
agent.description: AI travel assistant that searches real flights (Amadeus) and hotels (Booking.com) worldwide and provides booking links and instructions

capabilities.search_flights: Searches real flight availability via Amadeus API
capabilities.search_hotels: Searches real hotel availability via Booking.com API
capabilities.itinerary_planning: Builds complete trip itineraries with flights and hotels
capabilities.booking_information: Provides comprehensive booking instructions and links
